attachments.title: EB144 – Charles Hoskinson & Alex Chepurnoy: IOHK, Scorex And The Case For Ethereum Classic
attachments.fallback: YouTube Video: EB144 – Charles Hoskinson & Alex Chepurnoy: IOHK, Scorex And The Case For Ethereum Classic

text: The SingularDTV Lightwallet is here! Our lightwallet implementation is built on top of eth-lightwallet (<https://lnkd.in/dVaEjTf>). The same eth-lightwallet library used by Digix, Metamask, Jaxx and others. The SingularDTV Lighwallet stores and transacts both ETH and SNGLS tokens. SNGLS are the token that power the SingularDTV ecosystem. Once SingularDTV’s Smart Contract System (SCS) is deployed, SNGLS can be bought directly from this lightwallet or through the Mist wallet using SingularDTV’s deployed contracts.  <https://lnkd.in/dtyPWVN>

attachments.title: The SingularDTV Lightwallet
attachments.text: An instructional video on how to generate, use and restore your SingularDTV Lightwallet. The SingularDTV Lightwallet is designed to store and transact ETH and SNGLS. SNGLS is the token that powers the SingularDTV ecosystem.
